## fixViewportFeature variable

This feature inserts or replace a `<meta name="viewport" />` tag in the head to guarantee that the viewport will not exceed device-width. See [MDNâ€”Using the viewport meta tag ...](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Mozilla/Mobile/Viewport_meta_tag)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fixViewportFeature: Feature<FixViewportOptions>
```
